data.name: Delusions of a Lost Soul Demo
data.detailed_description: Play the introduction for Delusions of a Lost Soul!
data.about_the_game: Play the introduction for Delusions of a Lost Soul!
data.short_description: Play as Benjamin Farwell, a paranormal detective. Return to Lansinet Castle to solve puzzles, avoid traps, and free your partner's trapped soul.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of blood and gore.
